title: "'AI godfather' likens his emotions to atom bomb inventors"
excerpt: "Yoshua Bengio, along with Geoffrey Hinton and Yann LeCun, represent the three AI \"godfathers,\" who won the 2018 Turing Prize for computing breakthroughs. Bengio called processing the potential harm of the AI \"challenging, emotionally speaking,\" especially after building his career around bettering society."
